name: Build the Boss
description:
The game:

The evil little helpers are on the edge of world domination. But as helpers, they need a boss to succeed! Can you help to build one?

In this hectic factory puzzle game made for VimJam2 you place conveyor belts to build the parts for the robot. But watch out! If something falls on the ground you need to start again.

Controls:

Click to pick up conveyor belt. Turn picked up pieces with the mouse wheel, the left and right button or A and D. Place them down again by clicking.
